nodes.text: Wires was in charge of the tracking computer of the New Hope. He secretly used thirty-two percent of the excess capacity of the tracking computer's system to run a virtual gambling casino.

However, Chief Warrant Officer Xiong Wong knew and blackmailed Wires into cracking an encrypted holodisc that Jan Ors had "borrowed" from Kyle Katarn, who was injured. Wong threatened to reveal Wires's secret to Commander Olifer if he did not help Ors. Wires managed to decrypt the disc which contained a message for Katarn from his father.
